  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020603</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020603</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Las entradas</string>
            <string language="en">The entries</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Einträge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les entrées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As entradas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le entrate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι καταχωρήσεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se explican las características de las entradas del diccionario y se exponen las distintas formas de enunciarlas según se trate de sustantivos, adjetivos, verbos, etc.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining the characteristics of the entries in the dictionary and presenting the different forms of stating them according to whether they correspond to nouns, adjectives, verbs, etc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Griego</string>
            <string language="en">Greek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diccionario</string>
            <string language="en">Dictionary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">entradas</string>
            <string language="en">entries</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, welches die Eigenschaften der Einträge im
Verzeichnis erklärt und die unterschiedlichen Formulare des Angebens 
sie darstellt, je nachdem ob sie Gegenstandswörtern, Adjektiven, 
Verben, usw. entsprechen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant les caractéristiques des 
entrées dans le dictionnaire et présentant les différentes formes 
de les énoncer selon qu'elles correspondent aux noms, aux adjectifs, 
aux verbes, etc...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explica as características das 
entradas no dicionário e que apresenta os formulários diferentes de 
indicá-los conforme o que correspondem aos substantivos, aos 
adjetivos, aos verbos, etc..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiega le caratteristiche delle 
entrate nel dizionario e che presenta le forme differenti di 
dichiararee secondo come corrispondono i nomi, gli aggettivi, i 
verbi, ecc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τα χαρακτηριστικά των λημμάτων στο 
λεξικό και που παρουσιάζει τις διαφορετικές μορφές της δήλωσης 
τους σύμφωνα με το εάν αντιστοιχούν στα ουσιαστικά, τα επίθετα, 
τα ρήματα, κ.λπ....</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Griechisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzeichnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einträge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grec</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dictionnaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">entrées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dicionário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">entradas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Greco</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dizionario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">entrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελληνικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεξικό</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καταχωρήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
